node.title: 'It's devastating': Tearful Cairns mother learns she'll be sent to the Gold Coast after COVID hotel fire
node.description: Dozens of people evacuated after a hotel quarantine fire in Cairns say they've been told they'll be flown thousands of kilometres away to complete the rest of their isolation.
node.content:
["Dozens of people evacuated from a blaze at a quarantine hotel in Cairns say they have been told they'll be flown thousands of kilometres away for their rest of their isolation period.", "One hotel guest,\u00a0Cairns mother Simmone Eletr, said up to 40 people were\u00a0told they would be transferred to the Gold Coast because there weren't\u00a0enough rooms in\u00a0the only\u00a0other\u00a0quarantine hotel in Cairns.", "\"It's devastating,\" said Ms Eletr, who had just started her 14 days of quarantine when the fire took hold of the 11-storey Pacific Hotel on Sunday.", "Ms Eletr fought back tears as she told the ABC\u00a0she had just returned from Newcastle in New South Wales\u00a0to visit\u00a0her\u00a0father-in-law before he\u00a0died from cancer.", "", "
Police believe the fire at the\u00a0Pacific Hotel being used for COVID-19 quarantine\u00a0in a Cairns on November 28\u00a0was deliberately lit.(Supplied: Simmone Eletr)
", "She said it was hard enough being separated from her children in the same city, but the prospect of flying two hours south to the Gold Coast was too much.", "Ms Eletr spoke to the ABC from\u00a0a room at another hotel where dozens of people had been told to wait for updates.", "\"At the moment, they're saying there's not enough rooms at the hotel, so they're sending everybody (here) to the Gold Coast.\"", "", "
Simmone Eletr said she and around 40 other people were told they would be transferred to the Gold Coast.(Supplied: Simmone Eletr)
", "On Sunday afternoon, Queensland Police said all evacuees had been relocated, but didn't specify where.\u00a0", "Earlier,\u00a0Queensland's acting Chief Health Officer Peter Aitken said some could be transferred to the other quarantine hotel in Cairns or to Brisbane.\u00a0", "Queensland Health did not respond to an ABC request for an update late\u00a0Sunday\u00a0about where the evacuees would be sent.", "
Fire destroys two rooms\u00a0
", "It's alleged a 31-year-old woman\u00a0lit the fire underneath a bed in the hotel on Sunday morning.", "She has\u00a0been charged\u00a0with one count each of arson and wilful damage and will appear in court on Monday.", "Miranda Barczuk was on her final day of 14 days' quarantine when she said she heard the hotel's fire alarm ringing, then muffled voices in the hall outside her room.", "\"I was actually in the bathroom putting on my make-up,\" she said. \"We've had a couple of false alarms, so I didn't think anything of it and then I went on the balcony and had a look.", "\"There was thick black smoke coming out from the apartment a couple of stories above me, and I just started to panic.", "\"One minute they said 'stay in your room', and then the next minute they said 'you need to evacuate'.\"", "Ms Barczuk tried to leave via the stairwell near her ninth-floor room, but it was filling up with smoke, so she and others, including mothers with newborn babies, tried the opposite stairwell and eventually made it to the ground floor.", "", "
Miranda Barczuk\u00a0was on the final day of quarantine when the fire broke out at the Pacific Hotel in Cairns.(ABC News: Jemima Burt)
", "Ms Barczuk said she had hoped to leave quarantine after a difficult few weeks during which she travelled interstate to\u00a0attend her father's funeral.", "
First day of quarantine
", "From the waiting room,\u00a0Ms Eletr\u00a0pointed out the apparent contradiction of putting people who are meant to be isolating in the same room.", "\"If you have COVID you're going to spread it if you cough, so what's the point,\" Ms Eletr said. \"Everyone has to be tested again because everybody has been mingling together.\"", "Earlier, Dr Aitken said no-one in the hotel had tested positive to COVID-19.\u00a0", "", "
After leaving isolation, guests at the Pacific Hotel quarantine\u00a0facility in Cairns were asked to wait in a room together.(Supplied: Simmone Eletr)
", "Another person in quarantine, Jarrod Elias, said it felt like there had been an oversight in contingency planning.", "\"It's overcrowded in here,\" he said. \"I have no mobile power left and I'm also missing [epilepsy]\u00a0medication, it's back in the room.", "Chief Superintendent Chris Hodgman said police were focused on the\u00a0evacuees' welfare.", "\"It's been quite traumatic for some of those people, so that's our focus at the moment,\" he said.", "\"They've got all their worldly belongings with them in the rooms, so we need to get that back to them as best we can,\" he said.", "\"Imagine being woken up at seven o'clock with this incident on a Sunday morning.\"", "Dozens were seen gathered in a local park as emergency services attended the blaze. It wasn't clear then where they would go or when they'd be reunited with their belongings.", "\"It's all in limbo, they're trying to work it all out,\" said Ms Eletr.\u00a0"]
